short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple new tab page to help you focus on your tasks.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
"Just Focus" is a powerful productivity tool designed to help you stay focused and achieve your goals with clarity and precision. This Chrome extension allows you to set clear, measurable, and achievable goals to keep your tasks on track.

Key Features:

Goal: Set a specific goal, such as "Read 20 pages" or "Publish 10 products."
Progress: Track your progress with a visual indicator, like "10 pages read" or "5 products published."
Task Description: Define the task clearly, like "Read chapters 1-5" or "Create product descriptions."
With "Just Focus," you can stay on target and track your progress in real-time, making productivity simple and effective.
